title: REPATRIATION OF MORTAL REMAINS
sample_text:
If an Insured Person sustains Injury during the Policy Period and within twelve months of its 
occurrence this injury results in Accidental Death, we will pay the Sum Insured as specified in the 
Policy Schedule / Certificate of Insurance towards the return of Mortal Remains of the Insured 
Person from the place of Death to his home country or hometown or place of burial/cremation 
anywhere in the world. 
12.

title: FUNERAL EXPENSES
sample_text:
We will pay an amount equal to the Sum Insured as specified in the Policy Schedule / Certificate 
of Insurance towards expenses incurred for last rites of the Insured Person if he sustains Injury 
due to Accident during the Period of Insurance, which shall within twelve months of its occurrence 
be the sole and direct cause of Death of Insured Person
